channel.title: Comments on: Uploading File to AWS S3 in Golang

item.title: By: Akshay Khairmode
item.dc:creator: Akshay Khairmode
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/uploading-file-to-aws-s3-in-golang/comment-page-1/#comment-1856">Nihat</a>.
S3 does not have real folders but follows a key-value approach. If your need to nest it, you can use the path as <code>parentfolder/childfolder/anotherchild/test.txt</code> in the key
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nihat.

S3 does not have real folders but follows a key-value approach. If your need to nest it, you can use the path as parentfolder/childfolder/anotherchild/test.txt in the key

item.title: By: Nihat
item.dc:creator: Nihat
item.description: Hi How can i upload a files inside to folder s3 with go?
item.content:encoded:
Hi
How can i upload a files inside to folder s3 with go?
